Sentencas: In this study, CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels are examined as protective coatings for chromium diffusion in metallic interconnect of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: Both spinels are prepared by co-precipitation technique in order to obtain high temperature conducting spinels.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: The spinels obtained after 4 h of calcinations in air at 500 degrees C exhibit tetragonal crystal structure with average grain size between 90 and 100 nm.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinel exhibits superior electrical conductivity over CoMn2O4 and both display NTCR (negative temperature co-efficient of resistance) behavior illustrating their use as a protective layer on interconnects for fuel cells operating at higher temperatures.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: Doctor-blade employed spinel coating over SUS430 alloy exhibits good adhesion between protective spinel layer and metallic alloy.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: Cross section micrographs reveal presence of nanosized and highly dense grains capable to resist the outflow of chromium ions present in SUS430.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: Mass gain and diffusion rate constant (Kp) was high for CoMn2O4 coated SUS430 illustrating Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinel as a better protective coating layer for interconnect application.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: Chromium outflow is restricted and the same is evident from all crosssection micrographs of spinel coated SUS430 specimens subjected for oxidation up to 1000 h. Estimated thickness of Cr2O3 layer was similar to 15 nm for CoMn2O4 whereas Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 coated SUS430 specimen had similar to 12.5 mu m thickness at the SUS430/spinel interface demonstrating superior resistance to chromium outflow.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect

Sentencas: The area specific resistance was lowest for Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 coated specimen (between 14 m Omega cm(2) - 15 m Omega cm(2)) followed by CoMn2O4 coated specimen reiterating Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 as efficient protective coating material for SUS430 SOFC interconnect.
Titulo: CoMn2O4 and Cu0.5Co0.5Mn2O4 spinels as efficient protective coating layers on SUS430 for SOFC interconnect
